casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Christopher Albert TARANTINO. No. 492P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 9, 2005. Joseph B. Cheshire, V, Raleigh, Sean P. Devereaux, Asheville, for Tarantino. Michael Bonfoey, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the emergency petition filed by Defendant on the 9th day of September 2005 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th day of September 2005."
